Moderate_Aptitude_MCQ_Questions.question_text: A car travels 150 km in 3 hours. What is its average speed?
If the ratio of two numbers is 3:4 and their sum is 56, what is the smaller number?
A man sells an item at a loss of 10%. If the cost price was $50, what was the selling price?
If the simple interest on $1,000 for 2 years is $100, what is the rate of interest per annum?
Two trains are moving in opposite directions at speeds of 60 km/h and 40 km/h. How long will they take to cross each other if the length of each train is 100 meters?
